comment._content:
A splendid photo,..
Those were the times...At least, it seems to me,...
If i remember well,...A long time ago,..
All the girls...all the women,  were so natural and smiling,..
But I might err,...After all, i am only a kind of poet..... 
Thank you, at Florida memory,...Bravo dear friends,...Real,..;-)
